column1: Church is too dangerous they said. Thanksgiving was too much risk. Loved one in ICU?... can’t visit. Too risky.    Welcome to Black Friday.    Means tax revenue.    Wake up America.    The left doesn’t care about YOUR health.    They care about THEIR wealth.
What is this “NFL” they speak of?   Is it an abbreviation for a part for my Harley? Is it a new BBQ pit accessory? How is this NFL thing related to Sunday?
